name: Pixelated duels: Wild west
description:
How to Play: 

You control the cowboy on the left side. Press the first mouse button when the "shoot" command is given. Then, aim the mouse at the opponent and press the first mouse button again.

Punctation:

Head - shot = 300 p

Chest - shot = 300 p

Leg - shot = 300 p

Player Dead = -100

Draw = -100

False Start = -50

Thanks for playing the game, please leave a comment on the site.
